spec_data.Name: perl-Test-EOL
spec_data.Description:
This module scans your project/distribution for any perl files (scripts,
modules, etc.) with Windows line endings. It can also check for trailing
whitespace.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 04:45:51 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Check the correct line endings in your project
